title: Ipl Score Prediction System
description: This is a project made to predict the scores of team and players and also has many features like live score, player's database and so on.

title: Pain Management
description: This is a project made for stroke patients by creating a VR environment with many functionalities to over come the immobility.

title: MultiFeature web
description: This is a project made to experince multi features like translator,text to speech, summarizer, notepad and so on.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: This is a project made to experince a simple recommendation system that recommends or suggests movies based on our intrests, needs or input
